sentences.en: Most of these products were from natural sources, liable to putrefaction and of non - uniform quality.
sentences.cn: 这些产品大多数来属于天然材料, 易于腐烂而且质量不均一.

sentences.en: Proteolysis and putrefaction are typical results of microbial spoilage of such high - protein materials.
sentences.cn: 蛋白水解和腐化是这些 高蛋白 物质发生微生物变质的典型结果.

sentences.en: The time consuming process for making processed meats creates high bacteria counts and putrefaction in the meat which need to be treated with chemicals.
sentences.cn: 在加工面粉的时会产生大量细菌，还有腐败的肉制品需要用化学物品来处理。

words.tran_cn: [生化] 腐败的；腐烂的；易腐败的
腐败的；腐烂的；令人厌恶的
